key_talking_points: Florida is applying offensive pressure early, with two shots on goal in quick succession.
Edmonton will go on the power play after a tripping penalty was called on Florida.
The score is currently 5-4 in favor of Florida. Edmonton needs to capitalize on this power play opportunity to tie the game.
Florida has outshot Edmonton 42-46 so far.
for_commentary_agent.context: The momentum is moderate due to the shots on goal and a penalty. A mixed coverage approach allows us to discuss the penalty implications and the shot differential while still covering the live action.

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the upcoming power play for Edmonton and the shot differential between the two teams. Briefly mention the score and game context.
